entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon then west 50 gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
